H3.text: actor who played caesar in dawn of the planet of the apes. Andy Serkis

A4.text: In 2014, Serkis reprised his role as Caesar in Dawn of the Planet of the Apes

A5.text: He was also the trilogy's second unit director, which included directing aerial shots and battle scenes
